title: "AI Robotic Glove May Help Stroke Victims Play Piano Again"
excerpt: "Artificial intelligence (AI) combined with robotics is offering hope to those who have suffered neurotrauma. New research published in the journal Frontiers shows how an AI-powered soft robotic glove can help patients with neuromuscular disorders relearn how to play the piano."
